Execution of suspicious processes on int.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 for execution of processes with low prevalence, unsigned binaries, or suspicious parent-child relationships. Correlate suspicious process executions with network connection events (Windows Event ID 5156) and Zeek conn.log/dns.log. Look for patterns like fixed-interval connections (beaconing - time series analysis), rapid connection attempts to multiple external IPs (scanning/spreading), or connections to known malicious infrastructure. Use frequency analysis to identify processes with unusual outbound connection counts or rates.
